language.name: English (Pirate)
dev_card.eco_conference.name: Eco Parley
dev_card.victory_point.name: Victory Doubloon
dev_card.highway_madness.name: Sea Route Madness
dev_card.trading_frenzy.name: Plunderin' Frenzy
dev_card.monopoly.name: Monopoly o' th' Seas
dev_card.eco_conference.description: Move th' eco parley an' steal 1 treasure card from a scallywag with a trade post adjacent t' th' new eco parley location.
dev_card.victory_point.description: This here card be worth 1 victory doubloon when revealed, arr!
dev_card.highway_madness.description: Place 2 new sea routes as if ye had just built 'em.
dev_card.trading_frenzy.description: Take any 3 treasure cards from th' bank, ye lucky dog!
dev_card.monopoly.description: Choose 1 treasure. All other scallywags must give ye all their treasure cards o' that type.
resource.wood.name: Timber
resource.brick.name: Cannonballs

resource.wheat.name: Grub
resource.ore.name: Gunpowder

player_infrastructure.settlement.name: Trade Post
player_infrastructure.city.name: Port Town
player_infrastructure.dev_card.name: Treasure Map
port.generic.name: Generic Harbor
port.wood.name: Timber Harbor
port.brick.name: Cannonball Harbor
port.sheep.name: Crew Harbor

port.ore.name: Gunpowder Harbor
tile.forest.name: Timber Isle
tile.hills.name: Rocky Outcrop
tile.mountains.name: Storm Peak
tile.fields.name: Fertile Shores
tile.pasture.name: Crew Quarters
tile.desert.name: Cursed Island
hint.turn.roll_dice: Roll th' bones t' start yer turn, matey.
hint.turn.trade: Trade yer treasures, then choose yer next plunderin'.
hint.turn.build: Build yer empire or end yer turn, arr!
hint.turn.play_dev_card: Play a treasure map, then choose yer next plunderin'.
hint.turn.eco_conference: Move th' eco parley t' steal a treasure card from a rival pirate.
hint.turn.highway_madness: Click t' build two sea routes fer free, savvy?
hint.turn.trading_frenzy: Choose any 3 treasure cards from th' bank.
hint.turn.monopoly: Choose a treasure type t' steal from all rival pirates.
hint.turn.steal_resource: Click on an adjacent trade post t' steal a treasure card from that scallywag.
hint.turn.repair_tile: Click on a damaged isle t' repair it.
hint.turn.move_robber: Click on an isle t' move th' bilge rat an' steal a treasure card from a rival with an adjacent trade post.
hint.turn.build_settlement: Click on a valid crossin' t' build a trade post.
hint.turn.build_road: Click on a valid edge t' build a sea route.
hint.turn.build_city: Click on one o' yer trade posts t' upgrade it t' a port town.
